00101 bool YclopsReactiveNavInterface::getCurrentPoseAndSpeeds(mrpt::poses::CPose2D &curPose, float &curV, float &curW)
00102 {
00103         CGenericSensor::TListObservations       lstObs;
00104         CGenericSensor::TListObservations::iterator     itObs;
00105         gps->doProcess();
00106         compass->doProcess();
00107         gps->getObservations(lstObs);
00108         if(lstObs.size() == 0)
00109         {
00110                 //return false;
00111 
00112                 curPose.x(robotPose->x());
00113                 curPose.y(robotPose->y());
00114                 
00115                 return true;
00116         }
00117         itObs = lstObs.begin();
00118         CObservationGPSPtr gpsData = CObservationGPSPtr(lstObs.begin()->second);
00119 
00120         cout << "In yclops reactivenav" << compass->getYaw() << " " << compass->getPitch() << " " << compass->getRoll() << endl;
00121         cout << " valid? " << compass->isYawValid() << " " << compass->isPitchValid() << " " << compass->isRollValid() << endl;
00122 
00123         poseEst->update(gpsData,compass->getYaw(), compass->getPitch(), compass->getRoll());
00124         mrpt::poses::CPose3D thirdDim = mrpt::poses::CPose3D(curPose);
00125         this->poseEst->getPose(thirdDim);
00126         robotPose->x() = thirdDim.x();
00127         robotPose->y() = thirdDim.y();
00128 
00129         curV = this->curV;
00130         curW = this->curW;
00131         curPose.x(robotPose->x());
00132         curPose.y(robotPose->y());
00133         return true;
00134 }

00169 double YclopsReactiveNavInterface::getHeading()
00170 {
00171         return robotPose->yaw();
00172 }

00174 void YclopsReactiveNavInterface::useYclopsMotorCommand() {
00175         delete this->motor;
00176         this->motor = new MotorCommand();
00177 }

00179 void YclopsReactiveNavInterface::useWiiMotorCommand() {
00180         delete this->motor;

00184 void YclopsReactiveNavInterface::useNullMotorCommand() {
